title: Can only pick from the free to play for URF in a custom
body: When you set up a custom game for URF, when you go into champion select, you can only pick from the free to plays. The steps to recreate would be to set up a custom for URF, Blind Pick, then start the game. So far this has 100% recreation success, so it shouldn't be hard

replies.body:
No....  You can only ban the free to plays...

And that is only if you are solo

After banning phase, all champions you own are available.
